content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":475221,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7749c543-b948-440f-a601-3a830d901fc4/Picture12.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/7749c543-b948-440f-a601-3a830d901fc4/Picture12.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Picture12.png\",\"name\":\"Picture12.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"7749c543-b948-440f-a601-3a830d901fc4\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":739.3333740234375,\"height\":305.29097121801135},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We are glad that you are now part of EPAM People Programs!\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-font-kerning\":\"18.0pt\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"This module is intended for new team members joining People Programs team to make the adaptation to the role as smooth as possible.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-font-kerning\":\"18.0pt\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here you will learn general information about People Programs: who People Programs are; where People Programs are within People Management; up-to-date information on Employee Experience in the company; leadership team and Portfolio structure; program suites in Portfolio and many more.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-font-kerning\":\"18.0pt\"}}}]}]}]}}"
